sections.heading: Appeal; mistake of clerk; effect; procedure
sections.text: A mistake, neglect or omission of the clerk shall not be a ground of error, until the same has been presented and acted upon in the court in which the mistake, neglect or omission occurred.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 597, p. 500;R.S.1913, ยง 8201;C.S.1922, ยง 915

sections.heading: to error in inserting erroneous answer day in summons in county court. Ley v. Pilger, 59 Neb. 561, 81 N.W. 507 (1900).
